name: Intensive Care
info: An intensive care unit (ICU), also known as an intensive therapy unit or intensive treatment unit (ITU) or critical care unit (CCU), is a special department of a hospital or health care facility.

name: Lab Tests
info: A medical procedure that involves testing a sample of blood, urine, or other substance from the body. Laboratory tests can help determine a diagnosis, plan treatment, check to see if treatment is working.

name: Health Checkup

name: Medicine at Discounted Price
info: A pharmacy (also called 'drugstore' in American English or 'community pharmacy' or 'chemist' in Commonwealth English, or rarely, apothecary) is a retail shop which provides pharmaceutical drugs.
